content.rendered:
Please view the links below for more information:

  • Free Application for Federal Student Aid FAFSA: All current and prospective students interested in federal student aid will need to complete their FAFSA.
  • La Verne Portal: Login to view or update your personal and academic information, access your La Verne email address and Blackboard, register for classes, complete your financial aid, and make payment arrangements.
  • Federal Direct Loan: Use this link to complete Federal Direct Loan Requirements including Entrance Counseling, and the Master Promissory Note for subsidized/unsubsidized loans.
  • La Verne Loan Requirements:  to complete your La Verne loan requirements including Entrance and Exit Counseling/Interview, TILA Documents, and other financial arrangements.
  • PLUS Loan: Parents and Graduate students use this link to go to the federal website to apply for the Graduate or Parent PLUS Loan.
